name: Mark of Magic
description:
Battle your friends in this action-packed magic-casting game!
Select from a roster of powerful magic users, each with unique spells that are cast by drawing its mark on the screen! The better you draw, the more potent the spell!

Features:
- Select from one of many unique magic users, each with unique abilities!
- Draw spells to unleash powerful magic. The better your drawing, the more potent the spell!
- Battle your friends in multiplayer mode or complete quests in single-player mode!
- Earn rewards from playing and level-up your favorite casters!

**DISCLAIMER**
This game is an unfinished product and as such, it may contain bugs or other defects. As well, this game's listing, including description and all promotional material, including but not limited to images, videos, and text, may not reflect current game-play. Please read the known issues below.
